<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]>WEBINARUpgrade to Your Dream Panel with the BendixKing Total Avionics Plan
<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]>
Date: Thursday, July 11th, 8 p.m. EDT Many pilots dream of upgrading their aircraft with a beautiful, modern and fully-integrated avionics suite that makes flying safer and more enjoyable. However, the upfront cost of a major avionics upgrade can be daunting. Don’t let more time slip by while your best flying awaits. Join BendixKing Senior Product Manager, Sapan Shah, and SocialFlight President, A&P/IA, Jeff Simon for a discussion on how BendixKing’s Total Avionics Plan <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/pages/total-avionics-plan]]> (TAP) enables you to upgrade to your dream panel today, at a cost that fits your budget. This webinar is produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>. SocialFlight is a popular mobile app and website that provides pilots with an interactive map of over 20,000 searchable aviation events and seminars. Jeff Simon, President of SocialFlight, is an A&P/IA mechanic, avionics industry expert, pilot and aircraft owner. He has spent the last 20 years promoting owner-assisted aircraft maintenance. Your webinar registration includes free access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com and the SocialFlight mobile app.
